PtSituationElement.Summary: Queens Express buses are detoured because of a building collapse on 34th St between 2nd and 3rd Aves. No stops will be missed.
PtSituationElement.Description: Queens Express buses are detoured because of a building collapse on 34th St between 2nd and 3rd Aves. No stops will be missed.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
BM5, QM1, QM2, QM3, QM4, QM5, QM6, QM10, QM12, QM15, QM16, QM17, QM18, QM20, QM21, X63, X64 and X68 buses are detoured because of a building collapse on 34th St between 2nd and 3rd Aves. No stops will be missed, however, riders will experience extra turns during the trip.
Spring Creek-bound BM5 buses will not stop at the 34th St/3 Ave and 34th St/2nd Ave stops. Customers can board buses at 34th St/Park Ave South.

PtSituationElement.Summary: BX15, M60-SBS, M100 and M101 buses are detoured because of paving on 125th St between Lexington Ave and Second Ave.

PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
BX15, M60-SBS, M100 and M101 buses are detoured because of paving on 125th St between Lexington Ave and Second Ave.

Manhattan-bound BX15 buses will make stops as requested along 126th St between Second Ave and Lexington Ave.

Bronx-bound BX15 buses will make stops as requested along 116th St between Lexington Ave and First Ave.

Manhattan-bound M60-SBS buses will make stops as requested along 126th St between the RFK Bridge and Lexington Ave.

Queens-bound M60-SBS buses will make stops as requested along 124th St between Lexington Ave and the RFK Bridge.

Southbound M100 buses will make stops as requested along 124th St between Lexington Ave and Third Ave.

Northbound M100 buses will make stops as requested along 116th St between Lexington Ave and First Ave.
